answers.answer: I Understand I Stay Hungry! I Munch All Day Long!
Don't be sad. I have gd and ate Sonic two days ago. I knew better but I wanted it so bad.
And I noticed that when what you're craving, it taste soooo good, wow
Lol.... We just can't get too crazy with the "good but bad now foods." I know it's hard, good gracious.... but the deed was done, let's get back on our A game, mama. ;P
I know, I always break the habit one day of the weekend, but thanks for not judging ;)
Its just like with any diet or health plan... you have to give yourself at least one day for a little slack or you'll crack all together!!

question: I had this craving for the new pizza from pizza hut, it was so good that I had 4 slices, I know that's bad with my diabetes, and I'm still hungry, with 4 slices still hungry, the more time I am, the more hungry I get :(((
title: Ok I've been bad
